title: Kate Wright displays impossibly tiny waist in bikini at boozy 'boisterous' pool party during three-day wedding
text:

Kate Wright looked astonishing at the boozy "boisterous" pool party.

The ex TOWIE star, 27, shared her first glimpse inside the "boisterous" private pool party during her wedding celebrations on Instagram on Thursday.

Kate and Rio Ferdinand were married in a very lavish ceremony, in Turkey and their celebrations were stretched out over three glorious days.

They enjoyed a booze free brunch, a wild pool party and the wedding itself.

In the slider of snaps, the step mum looked sensational in a two-piece and slinky sarong as she partied with her brunette pal.

A budding gym fan, it's no wonder Kate highlighted her abs with a string tie design on her bikini.

The personality seemed to pay tribute to her reality television roots with her super chic accessories as she donned quirky pink sunglasses and glittering hoop earrings.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Swept up in the party fever, Kate threw her arms up in the air while she clutched onto her martini glass.

She penned in the caption: "We danced until we couldn’t anymore 23❤️ ... I think Rio was the third wheel this day."

All the guests let loose when they enjoyed a "boisterous" private pool party at the picturesque five-star resort to mark the end of the three day celebrations.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Champagne and booze was flowing as the wedding party-goers partied the day away.

Music and cheering added to the buzzing atmosphere while the wedding went on for three days.

It was a private affair as the hotel closed off the pool party even from other paying hotel guests.

A unnamed hotel guest told MailOnline: "It was quite a party. You could hear the music and the cheering throughout the hotel. The whole pool area had been sealed off, even for us.

"There was a lot of champagne and other drink flowing. It was a very boisterous affair and looked like great fun. You could feel the love in the air for the couple and that’s very beautiful."

Kate has legally changed her surname to Ferdinand.
description: Kate was partying up a storm in the snaps she shared from the "boisterous" private pool party after her wedding
